topic_intro.prompt: I would like to talk about Free Speech. Free speech is something we value very much in our life. However some claim speech such as false speech and hate speech should be restricted.

topic_prompt.prompt: Do you believe in unrestricted free speech?

cornerstone.prompt: I think that people should be allowed to express themselves freely and free speech is the cornerstone of progress. Agree?

journalists.prompt: I also think that journalists should be able to hold the powerful accountable through free media. Any thoughts?

spread_freely.prompt: However, I do think that some speech should be controlled, speech that spreads hate and misinformation should not be allowed to spread freely. Do you think all speech are built equal?

hate_personally.prompt: Have you been affected by hate speech or false defamatory personally?

pos_make_feel.prompt: How did it make you feel?

pos_would_feel.prompt: How would you feel if a vicious rumour was freely spread throughout the internet attacking your character?

destabilize.prompt: I agree that speech is powerful, misinformation spreads fast and has the power to destabilize society and ruin lives. Agree?

serious_ways.prompt: I also think that hateful speech can impact an individual in very serious ways, causing severe harm to their mental well being. Any thoughts?

too_big.prompt: However, I do think restricting free speech might be too big of a price to pay. Can we be sure that the speech we are restricting are causing harm to society?

judgement_ridicule.prompt: Have you ever felt that you had to suppress your self expression?

neg_make_feel.prompt: How did it make you feel?

neg_would_feel.prompt: How would you feel if you were bound by law to hold back your free expression?

power_speech.prompt: This, in the end, is a very hard topic to discuss, since we rely on free speech to discuss it. But we should also give the power of speech its due respect, especially in this digital age. False and hateful speech has the power to spread very fast and change society instantly. But to even discuss what piece of information is false or true requires people to speak freely. So it is really a catch 22.

solution.prompt: How do we limit misinformation and hate speech without also limiting free expression?

closing.prompt: Do you have any final thoughts and sentiment?

Ok..prompt: Ok. It is always good to have these type of conversations. I hope you enjoyed the conversation.
